thread.title: First Great Western workers due to walk out tonight | West Country (W)
thread.title_full: First Great Western workers due to walk out tonight | West Country (W) - ITV News

author: itv.com
title: First Great Western workers due to walk out tonight | West Country (W)
text:
A three-day rail strike is due to start from midnight tonight. Credit: PA First Great Western rail staff will be walking out from midnight tonight - marking the beginning of a three day strike.
Members of the RMT union say the company have failed to guarantee that jobs will be protected when new high-speed trains are introduced in 2017.
Passengers are being urged to check their travel plans .
Last updated Sat 29 Aug 2015 Read more 10 updates Bank holiday rail strike Travel First Great Western Rail strike
